newlifebegins

hexo配置

Jan 16, 2017

install hexo

$ npm install hexo-cli -g

$ hexo init blog

$ cd blog

$ npm install

$ hexo server -p 8080

Create a new post

$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing

Run server

$ hexo server -p 8000

More info: Server

Clean static files

$ hexo clean

More info: Generating

Generate static files

$ hexo generate

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment

  • newlifebegins fullstack web developer
